Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Clarifies provisions related to overtime ceilings for correction officers who are members of certain retirement plans
Summary: Clarifies provisions related to overtime ceilings for correction officers who are members of certain retirement plans.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to overtime ceilings for correction officers who are members of certain retirement plans
